overview:
Steven is one of the founders of RAVN (formerly Skyara), a marketplace for experiences.

Steven Ou is primarily in charge of product development, technology strategy and implementation. Previously, Steven has worked at Investment Technology Group creating sophisticated algorithms and pattern recognition for data mapping purposes.

In 2006, Steven singlehandedly created a full-fledged online movie reservation system for startup CineNow.com.sg in Singapore by reverse-engineering a network of black-box automated movie rental machines (similar to Redbox). This real-time online rental system was significantly faster and more flexible than the default software provided by the machines themselves.

Steven obtained a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from the University of Pennsylvania. His expertise includes web development, database administration, business development, and web strategies.
